name: RMS Hermetica
description:
WSAD movement - Q or Left Bumper to time travel - E or Right bumper to interact.

My submission for the 2022 Epic Megajam in the Army of One category.

Travel between future and past to explore the wreck of the RMS Hermetica, a steampunk sailship. In each area find hidden keys and bulkhead wheels to progress. Attempt to complete the game within the time-limit for your selected difficulty setting.

Uses one CC0 photo from Pixel, a photo of one painting by my wife (Bee Kenner) done before the jam and several audio files from zapsplat.com. Otherwise models are self-made in blender with procedural materials and using some textures from unreal starter content. This is an Army of One entry, with everything made by myself with the above exceptions.
